nodes.text: The Great Hall of Birren was a palace for the Elder House of the planet Birren. The Great Hall contained a treasure room which held a few run-down droids and other miscellaneous keepsakes, including a message from Bail Organa to his adopted daughter, Leia Organa which informed her that her father was Darth Vader. The governor of Birren, Carise Sindian, discovered the message and used it to destroy Organa's reputation.
